warnings.title: Districts with Multiple Spaces
warnings.description: Found 2 districts with multiple consecutive spaces: DAKSHINA  KANNADA, UTTARA  KANNADA
warnings.fix: The normalization function handles this, but consider cleaning the GeoJSON source data

warnings.title: Disputed Districts Found
warnings.description: Found 9 disputed districts: DISPUTED (RATLAM & MANDSAUR), DISPUTED (ALIRAJPUR & DAHOD), DISPUTED (RATLAM & BANSWARA), DISPUTED (SAHIBGANJ, MALDAH & KATIHAR), DISPUTED (MANDSAUR & JHALAWAR), DISPUTED (NIMACH & CHITTAURGARH ), DISPUTED (BARAN & SHEOPUR, DISPUTED (SABAR KANTHA & UDAIPUR), DISPUTED (SABAR KANTHA & SIROHI)
warnings.fix: These districts may not have API data. Consider handling them separately or showing a special message.

warnings.title: Duplicate Districts in GeoJSON
warnings.description: Found 6 duplicate districts: BILASPUR (2x), EAST (2x), HAMIRPUR (2x), NORTH (2x), SOUTH (2x)
warnings.fix: This may cause rendering issues. Verify if these are intentional (e.g., multi-part geometries) or errors.

suggestions.title: Reduce Coordinate Precision
suggestions.description: 99.5% of coordinates have >6 decimal places. Reducing to 6 decimals can reduce file size by ~50% without losing practical accuracy (10cm precision).

suggestions.title: Large GeoJSON File
suggestions.description: GeoJSON is 5.15 MB. Consider: 1) Reducing coordinate precision, 2) Removing unused properties, 3) Using vector tiles for production.
